name: Looping
description:
Ludum Dare 47  - Stuck in a loop

EPILEPSY CAUTION

If you or any member of your family has a history of epilepsy, consult a physician before playing this game. You use the game at your own risk.

Help the little robot to get out of the loop.  

Controls:

[A or Left] and [D or Right]: move

[W or Up]: jump and climb

[SPACE]: shoot and enter
